snippet: The Mexican Navy will expand patrols to stop the illegal fishing that threatens the vaquita, and gillnets that accidentally snare and kill them will be banned for two years.
abstract: Mexican Navy expands patrols in Gulf of California in effort to stop illegal fishing that has reduced number of small porpoises called vaquitas to fewer than 100.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican Navy will expand patrols to stop the illegal fishing that threatens the vaquita, and gillnets that accidentally snare and kill them will be banned for two years.

headline.main: Mexico’s President Rolls Out Plan to Save Endangered Porpoise
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | The Americas; Mexico: Patrols Ordered to Save Endangered Porpoise
